name: LAZERSTORM
description:
Face paced bullet-hell combat, an online leader-board,
and EPIC boss fights!

Use your gravity hook to collect scrap from downed fighters and increase your score multiplier. But be careful, you'll need to move slowly in this fast paced bullet-hell to collect these valuable items.

Can you reach Sector 7?

Tools Used:
Unity, Visual Studio Code, LAMP, Paint.net, Soundation, SFKR
